component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.webapp.security.policy
component.documentation: If the default policy used for computing the list of document permissions from the UI is not suitable for you, this is the place where you're able to modify it. You just need to subclass the default security policer and register it using the 'provider' extension.
Policy takes a document and it's associated security data as input and returns user entries that fits with.
